dialogues.text:
Structure detected:
Floor appears brittle but intact.
Breaking it is currently beyond your capabilities.

Are you so sure of that?
Mark it. We’ll come back later.

Marking location.
Nearby anomaly detected:
A portal-like phenomenon.
Functionality: unknown.

That’s a tear in space.
Step in, and it’ll take you somewhere else.
Basic enough.

Clarification:
Are you certain this will not result in catastrophic disintegration?

Pretty sure. Used these before.
Still here, aren’t I?
It's just a matter of dashing into it with the circle power.

Circle power?... 
Please elaborate. My memory is incomplete.

It’s one of the suit’s tricks.
A quick burst to the side.
Useful for closing gaps or dodging threats.
Interesting. Does it have offensive potential?

It does.
Time it right, and you can slam into enemies.
Hits hard enough to handle most threats.

So... mobility and offense in one system?
That’s efficient design.

Exactly. Only...
I forgot how to trigger it.
Cross-referencing circle power has given a match in the suit's internal guide.
Right, I think I'll have one more look at that guide before continuing.
